name: Disappointing Your Dad
description:
You're a delinquent who's mission is to skip class. Fight the other school's gangs on the way home. Get to your house to finish the game! Tip: Don't hang around the school for too long or you might get caught!

Game produced at TO Jam 12

Produced by: Blue Sofa Studios (Miguel Favero, Juan Toro, Ivan Boyko)

*Quit Game only only works in the stand alone game and not in the browser
